extendedInfo.description: Extreme Off-road Drag racing, the eternal classic of car racing games, now Take the wheel and see if you are up to the challenge!Enjoy a fast-pasted super-racer car that will help you take over any obstacles and surpass your competition. Forget all about the asphalt racers and go off-road to enjoy the rocky side of the competition track. Crazy monster truck games are always a fun adventure to embark on, and a perfect opportunity to spend a rainy afternoon.Fast paced Extreme off-road drag racing hd wallpaper! Please set as wallpaper,if you like it!!!Tags:Death racing,Real racing,Highway racing,street racing,underground racing,drift racing,speed racing,need for super speed,police chases,Speed Drag racing, truck, race, off-road, racing truck games,truck speed racing,Truck off-road Racing,Racing Fever,Crazy Kart.
